intro: You don’t escape the desert—you become part of it.
description:
In The Long Desert Drive, you wake in an abandoned house with no answers—only your
instincts and a dusty old car. With supplies gathered from the garage, you set off into a
vast, unpredictable desert. Your car becomes your only companion in a world that feels
hauntingly empty.
Scavenge for resources, upgrade your vehicle, and survive against all odds. Every stop
brings new risks, strange encounters, and a growing mystery behind the silence that
surrounds you.
Features:
• Explore the Unknown: Travel an open, unpredictable desert full of strange stops and
hidden secrets.
• Scavenge and Survive: Collect vital supplies and upgrade your car to stay alive on the
endless road.
• Unexpected Dangers: Face enemies, breakdowns, and the unknown at every turn.
• Your Car Is Everything: It’s your shelter, your weapon, and your only ally.
• Lonely but Alive: Uncover the mystery of a world gone silent—one mile at a time.
This isn’t just a trip through the desert—it’s a test of your will, instincts, and endurance.
In a world that has forgotten you, will you keep going… or fade into the dust?
